name: Oğuzhan Özenç
title: Front-end Developer
about: I am a Front-End Developer with a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. I am passionate about participating in impactful projects that tell stories. Software development allows me to turn ideas into reality, and I find the journey from concept to application incredibly rewarding.

responsibilities: Leading front-end development for Offbeat Security, a single-page web application focused on blockchain security business.
Developing dynamic, responsive, and user-friendly interfaces with React, using media queries, CSS, and atomic design principles, and integrating React Router for seamless navigation.
Incorporated animation effects using react-awesome-reveal and creating a responsive slider with react-slick.
Customized Netlify (Decap) CMS for efficient content management and deployment.
Added a blog subscription feature to facilitate user engagement and content updates.
Managing the project lifecycle from concept to deployment, ensuring timely delivery and achieving 100% client satisfaction.
Utilized agile project management to drive results as a Technology Developer contributing to sustainable product development.
Researched and adopted technologies, analyzed market trends, and developed technology roadmaps aligned with innovation and sustainability goals.
Responsible for academic writing, preparation of patent applications, technical reporting, and presenting to internal and external stakeholders.
Collaborated with national and international partners to ensure projects aligned with industry standards and sustainability initiatives.

education.degree: Bachelor's Degree in Management Information Systems

projects.name: Offbeat Security
projects.description: A single page application for a blockchain security business aiming to partner with complex blockchain system builders providing security solutions.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: Creative collaboration platform that combines video conferencing and HD media streaming.

projects.name: #VanLife
projects.description: #VanLife app is a web application based on the React Router that will allow users to rent vans for roadtrips.
